attributes.action: Prioritise all emergency / key workers for Covid 19 vaccinations.
attributes.additional_details:
"Key worker" status has been referred to throughout the pandemic, it demonstrates the importance of the roles that are considered crucial to keeping the country running safely, namely; NHS staff, social care workers, schools and nurseries, police officer, prisons and probations, legal professionals, religious staff, journalists, government staff, delivery workers, supermarket staff, armed forces and MOD, firefighters, transport workers, gas and electric, financial....
Consider key workers now!
attributes.background:
Allow emergency / key workers to be prioritised for vaccinations to allow them to carry out their duties in protecting the public and helping to create a safer UK. 

Allow any surplus vaccinations that are not used to be redeployed through available unallocated / unattended bookings.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prioritise COVID-19 vaccines for first responders (police, fire, ambulance): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564155

All key workers to be higher up the list for coronavirus vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
